Related repos

  • Search in all file types
  • macOS app for fast file search without indexing
  • search tool with interactive UI, Boolean and fuzzy matching, archive and document support
  • Git tool with command-line and interactive search interfaces
  • rm replacement that sends files to a graveyard
  • Full-text search for files and browser history
  • fastRAG helps you build efficient retrieval-augmented generation pipelines with optimized LLMs and search tools
  • Go library for retrieval-augmented generation and document search
  • Postgres extension for real-time search and analytics
